name: Data Visualization Package (Community)
description:
Hey Designers! 👋


Upgrade your workflow with these customizable, ready-to-use data cards and charts. Use it to quickly create data rich interfaces, add statistics and key business data, and create dashboards. Explore the file to create new layouts, color combinations, and stylish data visualizations. UI Kit is 100% customizable and easy to edit.


✅ Responsive

✅ Componentized

✅ Highly Customizable

✅ 13 charts, 2 cards, 2 dashboards

✅ Design System

✅ Dark/Light Theme

✅ How to use guide


🙌 Hope you enjoy, thanks for the support!


💙 Don't forget to like and give feedback


🏀 Follow me on Dribble @trewilsondesign
